website_summaries.verdict: This is a fun party game that up to a dozen players at a time can enjoy.
pros: Race on a variety of tracks, using vehicles like gliders and motorbikes
Features include underwater racing, antigravity tracks, and midair tricks
Share highlights on Mario Kart TV and Miiverse
Race with 11 other players locally or online
cons: Mini-map only appears on the GamePad, which can be annoying to use
Some buyers report bad discs (invalid disc errors)

customer_reviews.title: 8 times the AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: The Package was a little underwhelming, but it’s forgiven playing the game! OMG The 8th time I tied my shoes wasn’t this big a deal! The Mario Kart Games are massive when it comes to World Building and Gameplay! And just when the last Kart experiment was a blast This totally went into the stratosphere with awesome tracks Like Waterpark, and Toad’s Turnpike among others and the Multiplayer! Mario Kart 8 is the reason The Wiii U has nothing to be Ashamed of! Race to get it
customer_reviews.author: Rashaud

customer_reviews.title: Start your Engines
customer_reviews.text: Possibly one of the best entries in the Mario Kart series, up there with Mario Kart Double Dash and Mario Kart 64. While the roster is somewhat lacking, having too many Marios (normal, Metal, Baby, and Tanooki), Peachs (Normal, Pink-Gold, Baby, and Cat), babies (Mario, Luigi, Peach, Daisy, Rosalina), and Koopas (Bowser, Koopa, Larry, Lemmy, Ludwig, Wendy, Morton, Roy, Iggy, and Dry Bowser) it also features for the first time guest characters from other Nintendo series as DLC, namely Link from the Legend of Zelda and Isabelle & Villager from Animal Crossing. The tracks are very imaginative and the music is stellar. The new anti-gravity feature really is worked in fantastically, making for some unique viewpoints and course design.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee May Ferenczi

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Superior Kart Racing Game
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart has been fun since the SNES era. Each installment got better and more tweaks with gameplay. The 8th entries might be the best in the series, and I'm glad it isn't disappointment. The graphics look cleaner, the gameplay feels more intense, the character rosters are all fantastic, and the unlockables are larger than before. The multiplayer stays true to its roots, and the online play is lag-free and spectacular. As of this time, the additional DLC is phenomenal and worthy for its good price. This iteration is among the best racing game for the Wii U. It is a highly recommended to pick up and play if you are a Wii U owner.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: A solid addition to a great series.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally crafted, lots of race tracks and racers, throughly detailed courses and funny animations. A deserving title in the Mario Kart line. My only gripe is that the character/kart selection screen is poorly designed. There are too many options and choosing between items when there are many with the same effect is annoying and frustrating. It does not encourage switching out and trying different things - I find myself wrestling a bit to try to get a build that I like and then resigning to playing that build until I can't progress further. It's a small problem with an otherwise excellent game, but Nintendo tends to get those points right.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Used, "like" new
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to playing this game with my nieces so as soon I got it I popped it in and it said system can't recognize the disc, please eject and clean disc. I did several times until I finally gave up. Maybe it was just a faulty disc, but the problem is that I contacted the seller and he promised me to give me all my money back including shipping, but shipping was not sent to my account. so I lost about 4 bucks on a useless buy.
customer_reviews.author: SinShoe96

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for myself, a 31 year old gamer that has not had a Nintendo console in years! Been playing xbox and ps for the better part of the last decade and this game has taken me back! I loved the original Mario kart on snes and this one plays pretty much the same except it has some awesome graphics! I got my wife playing this who is most definitely a casual gamer. The higher difficulties (150CC-200CC) provide a challenge even for someone that might consider themselves a pro gamer. I would say the difficulties are very well balanced so that anyone can play, I highly recommend it to anyone wanting a fun game!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Blank game
customer_reviews.text: This game arrived defective. The title page "MarioKart 8" comes up when put into the system but won't load. Just sent email to provider and waiting to hear if they will refund or replace. I still have not heard back from this retailer regarding a defective game.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the Dirt Track!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Mario Kart?! Purchased as a gift to allow everyone to enjoy a faster paced game on the Wii U than the typical sports games, Mario Kart 8 was loved by everyone no matter their age, from Grandparents to Grandkids, with each person liking different tracks and characters to drive on them. For the more serious player, as they race and finish in first place across a number of tracks, new tracks are opened up. There's lots to keep everyone entertained and the graphics are really pretty good, with a lot going on, but not so cluttered as to confuse people. A great game that doesn't take itself too seriously!
customer_reviews.author: RAD!Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Race Mario RACE
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart. This is one of the best mario kart game to date. I mean of course it would be! This game in the mail quick as the wind and I and happy to say this is worth it. I mean like I love mario kart games and this one is the best one. The maps are awesome and fun and the new character really makes you want more! Like honestly either you play this online or at home it is fun. Like if you love racing games and love the mario characters just get it no questions asked. Amazon really makes great deal on this product so when the sales up you better show up!
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Best Mario Kart To Date
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the best Mario Kart game to date. The graphics are beautiful, and there is a great selection of courses, characters, karts, etcetera. The DLC adds fun new courses, characters, and karts as well from Nintendo's popular Zelda and Animal Crossing franchises, both of which are presented very well in the game. There's also a 200 cc mode that downloads for free after installation, which is insanely hectic but really fun as well. My only complaint would be the lack of additional modes, since there is only Balloon Battle and not the Coin Battle that came with several previous games; the courses for Balloon Battle are also very limited and not that great in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Proteus

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart. It will own any of your free time.
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart is f****ing back! So creative, so beautiful, so much damn fun! I was let down by Mario Kart Wii so this just took it to the next level. Feels great with the gamepad, and the map laid out there. Online racing or spectating. Nailed it. But ALWAYS best playing with friends in the same room. Difficulty curve is just right. Plus FINALLY a way to stop evil Blue Shells! You'll be very satisfied and maybe even a little more than surprised at how much time and hours you sink into this one. Highly recommended. PLUS there are more characters, tracks and vehicles becoming made to download in the following months. Just keeps on giving! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: The REAL Talk

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TRUST THIS BUYER SELLING FAKE DISC GAMES AND SELLING THEM ILLEGALLY
customer_reviews.text: Terrible the CD does not work at all. Its a FAKE. Blank cd with a sticker on it. I had it checked and its a CDR disc not even a real game. Very Upset over this. I hate being taken advantage of and seeing my 6 year old son upset. Now i have to explain to my little boy that the money he saved up to buy a game was fake amd he got robbed. People should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.Evangelista

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Disc was defective and did not work. Tried multiple time but received same error message. Cleaned disc and still would not work. This would have been known my seller had they checked the discs functionality as their description stated.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J. Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart wins again
customer_reviews.text: After eight long, loyal years of service our Nintendo Wii died (May it RIP). We purchased a Wii-U and decided it was time to upgrade games too. This game has been a huge hit, and bought nothing but joy, the graphics are wonderful, the game play is really good, my 5 year old easily navigates through the menus, once again Nintendo delivers a great Mario Kart game, Thank you again Nintendo, it's always great to have an electronic babysitter for when I need a break
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to the series!
customer_reviews.text: The new Mario kart is phenomenal! All the classic parts are there, plus true kart customization! Mix and match parts to build a personal vehicle, keep trying to find the best combinations! The new tracks are imaginative and challenging, and the new mechanics only add to the game. Gravity defying upside-down courses are so much fun. On-pad play is possible (though it might take a little digging to find) for both Multiplayer and Single Player modes. On top of all this we are promised more characters and karts as DLC. The current character selection is a little odd, with some favorites missing. Hopefully they'll be patched in quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Plasmarobo

customer_reviews.title: This game is gorgeous and unbelievably fun!
customer_reviews.text: My friends were all blown away by how beautiful this game is. The tracks are mind-blowing! The post-game replays are also hilarious when you slow-mo. (Plus, Luigi's Death Stare is so scarey! :)) As of the launch, Nintendo is GIVING AWAY a free game when you buy this. You can get New Super Mario Bros U, Windwaker, Pikman 3, or Dance Party as a free downloadable game. All spectacular games, too. That's two great games for the price of one. Anyone who says the Wii U isn't that great a console can now shut the #@$% up. Mario Kart kills it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: BEST FAMILY / PARTY GAME of 2014 and BEYOND! Mario Kart is back!
customer_reviews.text: Value. Fun. Entertainment. Party. More. This is Mario Kart 8. Mario Kart is a cultural phenomenon at this point, and it's earned it's place to be so. I strongly recommend this series to any parents, gamers, and people that are interested in starting in Video Games. The Mario Kart series is simplistic, fast, fun, entertaining, and finally has been presented in beautiful HD graphics on the Wii U. You will find HUNDREDS of hours of content within this title, as well as even more through the DLC that has and will continue to be released.
customer_reviews.author: Hahke

customer_reviews.title: Must buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent new edition to the mario kart franchise. Addicting. Fun. Does not feel as "cheap" in suddenly losing at the last second in some other mario kart games. Reminds me of the days of going into the arcade and playing a racer. Has that same sort of vibe which is fun and nostalgic somehow. Cons - too many lame baby characters that i will never bother using. If i play too often i feel like i know the tracks inside and out almost too well if you know what i mean. Still the replay value remains high and this is one of the best games and a must purchase for the WiiU.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Levering

customer_reviews.title: A classic and still a favorite. Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Dad, Mom & 9 year old son....play this every night. We love this game. It's fun to win, earn trophies, new vehicle customizations new characters and new levels. It's a classic and still a favorite. Hoping to connect to the internet so that we can get even more characters, boards and fun add ons. :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Herald

customer_reviews.title: You'll be in the home stretch in 1st place driving your very best and painfully tested character/kart/wheels/glider rig
customer_reviews.text: You'll rage quit. This is a 5 star worthy provocation. You'll be in the home stretch in 1st place driving your very best and painfully tested character/kart/wheels/glider rig, having power slid, boost jumped, collected and expended the very best series of power ups and painted the lines all over the track - and then you'll get lightning bolted, and then spiny shelled, and then a bullet will smack you, and then you'll finish 12th covered in squid ink. You'll rage quit. You will. Then you'll come back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Kamensek

customer_reviews.title: WMKED
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this game and so do I! I must admit Mario Kart is a legacy game that gets better every generation. This is one of the first times I am glad to have a Wii U! I recomend getting this game and if before the deadline you get a Free (kinda buy 1 get 1) game. There are 4 to choose from, I also recommed getting this from Amazon because it was 49 vs 59 with the free game still if I had waited 1 day I would have gotten it for the 49 price :-/ . But again I love the game and the B1G1F is well worth 59 dollars for the game!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo is my favorite genre. Yes, it's a genre.
customer_reviews.text: This game has brought me back to my childhood! I am 27 years old and I bought a Wii U for the sole purpose to play Mario Kart 8. I couldn't be happier with my decision, as the system and game completely rock and do an excellent job of bringing me back to my childhood when I used to play the crap out of Super Mario Kart and Mario Kart 64. The graphics in Mario Kart 8 are awesome, the controls respond well, the game is easy to pick up and play but is challenging enough online or on harder difficulty modes. This game makes for an excellent time with friends. Pick it up!
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Best MK series
customer_reviews.text: The best Mario Kart series ever. Excellent graphics, great new challenging levels, including the new DLC I bought which gives me 16 beautifully designed tracks and extra characters to play with. Controls are solid and familiar if you've playing all previous series of the game. Multiplayer locally and online work great without much lags. Best of all the no-TV mode (gamepad screen only) works great when my wife decided to take over the TV for the night. Buy it and you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Chiu

customer_reviews.title: I hate that the price of these games have gone up ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate that the price of these games have gone up so much but hey you have to keep kids happy right! I bought this for my 4 year old cousin and he loves it! I've played with him a couple times and its actually a great game for adults too. We bought the mario and luigi steering wheels to go along with it but he prefers to use the main control. I like the steering wheels though it great to use when you have multiple players. I have defiantly gotten my money worth, he plays any chance he gets and according to his mom its a great bribing tool to do homework!!
customer_reviews.author: JayKruz_90

customer_reviews.title: I love this game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! It's the first Mario Kart game I've ever played despite being a longtime Nintendo owner. I started out on the 50 CC level and after a few days was breezing past the other racers there and got the three gold stars on every track and then moved on to the 100 CC level. That's more challenging but I've got the three gold stars on most of those tracks and and now I'm starting to play with the 150 CC level. That's much more of a challenge. You really can't make any mistakes there and win. It's a fun game with different levels of challenges and I really enjoy it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Can't miss Mario Kart
customer_reviews.text: Met all of my expectations! I love playing it with family and friends. I personally enjoy the balance they brought to the item system with less blue shells and not automatically getting overpowered items if you are further back in the pack. In other words, you won't always benefit from being in 5th, 6th, or even 7th. But I think they got almost everything right. I would have liked to have seen a little more imagination character wise (i'm tired of all of the baby versions of characters). Really enjoy the kart, bike, and atv designs as well. Overall, great game! And the graphics are truly amazing
customer_reviews.author: D. D'Orazio

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo, within my heart.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, i owned every nintendo device since the very beginning , and when the wii u came out last year i had it within the very same week, i do not regret getting the device due to its potential and unique exclusive games, so to cut the long story let me tell you a few things about MK8 1) Highly addictive and i mean highly addictive as you will be racing to get to first place. 2) The HD makes it a very beautiful atmospheric game to play especially since the game comes with alot of option. 3) Wii u owners or those who do not own one, please get it. you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Ali Jahrami

customer_reviews.title: This game is where friendships are either forged or destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love good ol mario kart action. Very solid game. Music/sounds are spot on, the new additions make for a fresh take on the beloved franchise. However, I personally feel they butchered the battle mode. They changed it to where you play on the same courses that are raced on. No more beloved block fort or small, action-packed square-like maps. Combat becomes very spread out and often boring. Knocked off a star for that. Otherwise the game is very addicting with its many unlockables, online play is fun too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Felton

customer_reviews.title: Family fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Our kids (5 and 6) love to play the game and have no real issues with it. One major change from previous games (which is quite frustrating) is that it no longer has the built in mercy rule to end the race once 11th place finishes. You have to wait for 12th to finish before the race is over so if you have a small child who is just playing around you could be waiting a long time. The battle mode is useless in this game also. Instead of the custom arenas like the N64 version had, you just battle on the tracks...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying a Wii U for.
customer_reviews.text: Best game for Wii U. I love this game and I love playing it together with my wife. Every time I play it I am amazed at how good it is graphically and even how much attention was spent to detail. Dirt sticks to your tires for a short time and you can even see the tread on the rubber. I have also downloaded the DLC that is available and it just further adds to the fun and options. I highly recommend this for anyone with a Wii U or looking for a fun game to play.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rawr

customer_reviews.title: I very much enjoy all Mario Kart games
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart, must I say more? I won't review the game here, as you can find tons of reviews. I very much enjoy all Mario Kart games, and this one does not disappoint at all. We have had hours of fun playing this, and our friends can easily pick up the game and we all have a blast playing. Also they are coming out with new maps and characters, two packs of 8 maps and 4 characters each. I think $12 for both packs if you pre-order it. I bet you can guess what we did :-)
customer_reviews.author: fishie20

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for Wii U owners.
customer_reviews.text: Best family game I've played in years, and the best Mario Kart game yet. Fun, beautifully animated, with entry-level playability for very young children (my four year-old plays with me) and higher difficulties presenting a challenge for even seasoned players. Lots of things to open up and unlock through gameplay that are a combination of difficulty-based achievements and persistence-based ones. Upcoming DLC planned for the future looks to offer lots of new content to keep things fresh and interesting for many months to come.
customer_reviews.author: Neophyle

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son. He loves all his Wii U games including this one. This game is a fun game to have. As he gets older he is starting not to like the Wii U games as much but the system does so many other things that he enjoys. He also likes to play his older Wii games on the Wii U console. Mario Kart 8 is a must have for all Mario fans.
customer_reviews.author: LEO N.

customer_reviews.title: I probably wouldn't beat you at this, but I still have my GameCube somewhere and I'd whoop you on that.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Mariokart girl from way back. I like this one, the tracks are interesting and pretty, I like that you can be one of Bowsers awful offspring, and using the Wii remote in a steering wheel is still way cool. Not 5 stars because the weird antigravity thing makes me motion sick like no other. Due to that, I can only do 1 cup at a time of the WiiU tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect with a few patches
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is a very fun game but is not a perfect game due to poor Nintendo policies and a rushed, slightly sloppy effort. The major problems here are : -no online voice chat (it's 2014!) -no online stat tracker (can't see total coins) -no rear view mirror -can't play local two player with one person using gamepad screen, must be splitscreen -poor character lineup If you ignore Nintendo's refusal to evolve as a company, this is a really fun Mario Kart game. The new stages are beautiful and the updated racing mechanics are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: This game really inspired me! I missed out on most Wii games including previous Mario Kart games.. When I knew that this game came out for Wii U I decided to buy the console and I was not disappointed. The online mode is what made this game special I really like it! If you're a fan of Nintendo then this game will definitely not disappoint you. If you haven't bought a Wii U yet because not too many games are on it I assure that this game is worth it and you will be playing it for quit some time.
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Defective Disc
customer_reviews.text: Back of disk was spotless but my Wii U couldn’t read it. It kept saying invalid disc can’t read. I gave up after cleaning it with a microfiber cloth. Thanks for ruining my weekend! I won’t be purchasing from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Riven

customer_reviews.title: A great Mario Kart game
customer_reviews.text: Another great entry into the Mario Kart franchise. Very fun and beautiful looking. I didn't realize how much better looking until my son fired up the last version on the Wii. It was mind blowing how much better this new one looks over the last version. My only complaint is the revamped battle mode. Instead of dedicated battle tracks to go around on, they reused the racing tracks. They're not good for battling because for a small group of people, you may never see your adversaries as you are moving around the track.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: A Title Worthy of the Franchise
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the Mario Party series, Mario Kart just gets better with age and this title is no exception. While unlocking new vehicles and characters is way too easy (other titles required tasks to be completed, but almost all extra content in this game is obtained by merely collecting coins while racing, obviously making the game more kid-friendly), the game itself looks and plays beautifully, and provides fun for both newcomers to the series and diehard fans who want a tough challenge. If you own a Wii U, you really need this game.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar S.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game whether you're a child, teen or adult. Race by yourself, with friends, or against people all over the world with the online feature. This is the first Mario Kart I've played since the N64 version and it sure has come a long way. The only thing I really miss is the battle arenas the N64 had for when you wanted to battle your friends. You can still battle it out but you have to do it on the race courses which aren't really set up for that kind of play. Still a great game though and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: westin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Mario Kart catalog
customer_reviews.text: My son bought a Wii-U just so he could play this game. New modes, new tracks, new characters. He likes the downloadable content and new 200cc mode. Good mix of old favorites, updated, and new tracks. A must for any Mario Kart lover. He does like playing on the game pad, better than using a wheel, that's different than on the wii. His sisters have said it doesn't drive quite as well with their wheels from the wii.
customer_reviews.author: dmo

customer_reviews.title: 22 years later... Mario Kart still rules
customer_reviews.text: This could be the only game I ever own for the Wii-U, and it would still be worth it. If you're on the fence about taking the plunge, go buy a $200 refurbished system from Nintendo, then scoop up Mario Kart 8 while the free game promotion is still going on. The HD graphics are beautiful, and it's almost impossible to peel yourself away from an online session. I can't count imagine how much sleep I've lost from staying up too late - whipping around Moo Moo Meadows. Buy this. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Timezones

customer_reviews.title: this game is a nostalgic delight as well as a beautifully crafted game
customer_reviews.text: A stellar game! With all the retro-tracks from the SNES addition onward, this game is a nostalgic delight as well as a beautifully crafted game. The new tracks and mechanics are immensely enjoyable. ...though if you really want to compete, you need to buy a wii gamepad. You don't need a special Wii U one. The old ones for the Wii work fine. The motion controls are fine for casual play, but really getting the most out of every slide on every corner requires a gamepad.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars of fun for you or a group.
customer_reviews.text: Best mario kart so far, I'm posting this long after beating the games. 3 star 150cc and everything unlocked. I usually get bored of racing games, but this one kept me hooked, it started with unlocking all the characters, then moved on to unlocking all the karts, wheels and gliders. I highly suggest sitting down with yourself and 3 friends for alot of fun. Or letting young kids hace a go at it. This is my favorite game on the wii u so far, and if you're on the fence about getting one, I really suggest getting a u just for this game.
customer_reviews.author: mc jones

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Not being a huge Mario Kart fan, I was impressed by this game. The graphics are fantastic given the Wii U hardware, and the challenge was superb. I had a bit of trouble drifting at first, but once you get a hang of the controls the game is quite enjoyable. The tracks are numerous - in the box you get 16 new courses along with 16 classic courses from previous games. The online play is also very entertaining. This is worth a Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Smartt

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been fans of this series -- some of us longer than the others -- and this iteration is a nice progression along the path. Some of the tracks take some getting used to -- driving on the walls is interesting. There have been some "tweaks" to the way the games are played, but overall, I think they are positive. I've only played the 50cc Grand Prix thus far, so I don't know if the difficulty has increased or remained the same overall. The computer drivers seem to be a little more intelligent.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baer

customer_reviews.title: One of the few Wii U games I actually bought. It's one of the better titles for this console, but still similar to Mario Kart 7
customer_reviews.text: One of the few wii U games I actually bought. It isn't much better than mario kart 7, but you get new levels and a couple new characters at least. Kind of expensive, but nintendo has to pay their employees somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: OK Mario Kart Title
customer_reviews.text: Fun but could be better. Unlocking cars and characters would've been more fun if you could spend coins to unlock things instead of getting a random unlock every time you collected a certain amount of coins. The added "gravity" isn't necessary or even noticeable really. Pros: Looks amazing, controls are spot on. Cons: Paying for extra tracks and characters? Come on Nintendo. What happened to the days where you bought a game and IT CAME WITH ALL OF THE CONTENT. I'm not paying you so I can race with Zelda. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Mario Kart in Over a Decade!
customer_reviews.text: I've played every game in the Mario Kart series, and I've owned all but two. I can say without hesitation that Mario Kart 8 is my second favorite in the series! (Double Dash is still my favorite.) This game is so amazing! The level of detail alone is mind blowing, but the fun factor is phenomenal! Control is tight and smooth, even when using motion controls. Graphics and art are second to none, and that includes games on more powerful systems! This is the definitive game for Wii U, and one that every gamer... Nay, every PERSON, needs to play!
customer_reviews.author: PaleoCollector

customer_reviews.title: Good Childhood Memories
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 has been an incredible amount of fun. It really brings me back to the days of my childhood when I played this with my parents -- and they'd wait just before the finish line so I could end in first place (My little kid self did not realize this was happening). Now as I've gotten older, I had to sit at the finish line and wait for my Dad to catch up.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: A worthy addition to the series.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the MKart series since childhood and this one doesn't disappoint. Controls are great, the tracks are fun and the larger number of racers make things more chaotic. The online so far has been fantastic, even on the wii u's wireless. Matchmaking is also quite good at pairing you with others around your bracket. Gamepad can be used either to show the placing/powerups of other racers, or as the main screen. Amazon has this game for a great price. Pick it up ASAP to take advantage of the free EShop game promo!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Yay, more Mariokart!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful game and quite fun, like every other Mariokart game. The only thing I don't really like about it is while in 2 player mode, the screen is split down the center vertically which makes it really difficult to see the track. It seems like it would've made a lot more sense to split the screen horizontally so you could see all around. I'm not sure if there's maybe an option to switch? I enjoy the slow motion replays too. It's a good game.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Moo Moo Meadows in 1080p!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the Mario Kart circuit since the original SNES days and this latest entry in the series lives up to the Mario legend and lets me dominate all of my opponents without skipping a beat. The game has tons of tracks and unlockable characters and you can also customize your kart's tires and glider. The classic tracks look amazing in 1080p and Nintendo has finally done a good job with online play and DLC too. I'll see you at Moo Moo Meadows!
customer_reviews.author: Trout

customer_reviews.title: The finest Mario Kart game to date
customer_reviews.text: The finest Mario Kart game to date, plain and simple. If you like Mario Kart you will like this. If you haven't tried Mario Kart, this is a great time to join. Great controls, graphics, and really solid game play. The ONLY problem is Battle Mode. instead of isolated battlefields, they take place on actual courses from the main game. This gives you TO MUCH room to maneuver and really reduces the frantic game play to desperately searching for other players. Despite that, the main game totally makes up for it in spades, and is deserving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MBNuckles

customer_reviews.title: Best Entry in the Series and Very Accessible
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is the best Mario Kart yet and an excellent addition to the Wii U's roster of excellent games. The tracks are creative and the lineup of returning tracks from previous Mario Karts is superb as well. Those who do not normally play racing games will find this to be quite different. Rather than strive for realism, Mario Kart strives for accessibility, allowing most, even those who don't normally play video games, to quickly pick up how to maneuver your Kart, Bike, or ATV. There is also plenty of room for those looking for a challenge to take secret and shortcuts and beat their best time. I would say this game is a must-buy for and Wii U-owner.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Baron

customer_reviews.title: Still fun to play after a year
customer_reviews.text: A review after one year. The kid is still playing with it today. It’s definitely in his rotation of games he plays often.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: MK 7 was awesome so I naturally wanted MK8
customer_reviews.text: MK 7 was awesome so I naturally wanted MK8. The newer graphics are great and the anti gravity vehicles and air borne capabilities really add to gameplay. I don't see where MK8 is a profound improvement over 7 but like I said...I thought 7 was great! To me, the gamepad control is easier than the traditional motion controllers so I'm still getting used to that but all in all, a definite positive addition to the WIIU collection.
customer_reviews.author: M2gunner

customer_reviews.title: Our family approves of the new MarioKart!
customer_reviews.text: Who does not love MarioKart? This is a great version. The kids love all the different options, and enjoy having to work towards unlocking new karts and features. It took about a week or two for them to unlock most everything, but the replay value of this game lasts so much longer than any other game we own since it's always different when you have a group to play with. This was a must buy for our family. We love the graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Kate's kids

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game! The graphics are great and the best ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game! The graphics are great and the best part is that they take courses from their other game consoles (N64, Super Nintendo, etc) as well as created some new ones. The only down-side for me is that the "Battles" are not in closed course like older games but on the regular tracks you race on. It's difficult to find people. An awesome addition is the ability to race with people you know. We played with people from two different households and can talk through the Wii between races. Very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dias

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: Definitely fun for the whole family !!! We have had hours and hours of fun. I grew up with Mario Kart and had to have this newest edition and now I'm playing head to head with my wife and my 8y/o son. This game is so much fun, that now when I driving on the street and a car cuts me off I wish I have my own red shells to spin them out :) But seriously this game is fun for family and friends !!!
customer_reviews.author: Seasnoopy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: My whole family loves this game! I'm not a gamer, so I leave the gaming to my kids most of the time, but this is the one game we all love playing together again and again. I actually look forward to playing this with my kids and my husband. We laugh, joke, and have a lot of fun doing this together and having little competitions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Invalid Disc
customer_reviews.text: Despite a "very good" condition, an updated machine, and a confirmed coding for America, this used game would NOT work. Had to return it (which fortunately was no hassle). House of disappointed children :( Side note: the actual game is great! This review is based only on receiving a useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Genice

customer_reviews.title: What's more to love about Mario Kart?
customer_reviews.text: Great game on a great system! If this is your first venture into the world of Mario Kart, you will not be let down. In usual Mario Kart fashion you get new tracks, great old tracks, and lots of ways to customize your kart. This game does a good job of utilizing the Wii U screen as opposed to some games which just show whatever is on the big screen there. You shouldn't hesitate to purchase the premiere game on the Wii U, enjoy! *LUIGI DEATH STARE*
customer_reviews.author: Brian Etheridge

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous because it was used, but it came in perfect shape and we have already played it!
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the disc
customer_reviews.text: My kids love playing this video game all through the night. Lots of of excitement. Does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart 8 takes the franchise to a new level!
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is the amazing new addition to the famous series. It has lots of new elements and and tracks that make it unique and addictive. It is a complex gave that is tons of fun. If you haven't every gotten into Mario Kart now is the time, I guarantee you will be impressed. If your a fan of Mario Kart you need to get 8 it takes the game to the next level and you will love the wild ride it takes you on. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Fire Dad ^7

customer_reviews.title: total blast but battle mode is lame
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because the game is awesome! The battle mode is kinda lame but the rest of the game is so dang good you won't even care. Still, I really wish we had Mario Kart 64 style battle courses... The control in this game is so much better than in older versions of Mario Kart. You can use any controller configuration you can think of, they all work. This game is for anyone that's ever played Mario Kart in the past and anyone that loves racing games.
customer_reviews.author: T. Buckland

customer_reviews.title: Like It, but also disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I like the game but if you are not a veteran of Nintendo, you need to be able to see the back of the game before purchasing it. I played this game with the gamepad that game in the Deluxe set and it is not easy. You need a steering wheel. When you buy things they disappoint me when after you get it, you find out that in order to have fun, you have to purchase something else or just make out with what you have.
customer_reviews.author: dgoodloe

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Price finally dropped. I miss the old arena vs. maps. Doesn't seem to support pro controllers, but it does support at least 3 other configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite game
customer_reviews.text: This game is the bees-knees. We love inviting friends over to play Mario Kart!
customer_reviews.author: Megin Worsham

customer_reviews.title: Its fun for me
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done game for Nintendo I am sure fans will love this game.This game offers really challenging race, Online One and Two Player Mode,You can Upload your gameplay Highlights on Youtube,But sad part it doesn't have Voice Chat that fans wanted. Its true that Nintendo is giving way One Free downloadable Wii U selective titles for free if you bought Mario Kart 8 and use Nintendo Club code the offer ends I believe July 30th.
customer_reviews.author: J.T Vega

customer_reviews.title: MARIO KART!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've played all the mario karts on the main consoles (SNES, N64, Wii/Wii U) and love everyone of them! The game maintains its ability to hold onto all the fun and mechanics. The main thing i love about this version is that it has upgraded a few tracks from some of the older generation mario karts. The balance seems pretty smooth so far, not like some of the rediculous cheating it did back in the 64 days, lol. This game deserves a spot on the shelf for your home collection!
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: My kids, wife, and I have a blast racing each other. We've spent countless hours playing it. The variety of vehicles, features, and worlds to race through keep us coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Strong

customer_reviews.title: "A WINNER..."
customer_reviews.text: Great game, as I said in my review for JEOPARDY WII U, "I love that you can use the gamepad, rather than the TV to play." Plus, plenty of cool stuff waiting to be unlocked keeps the game interesting, at least IMO, you can also unlock the Koopalings as playable characters, and I know I'm probably going to get a lot of hate for saying this, but I definitely loved it more than SUPER MARIO WORLD 3D.
customer_reviews.author: COMICFAN

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Goodness.
customer_reviews.text: NO COMPLAINTS! Product said was in like new condition. Arrived on time. When it got here it was BRAND NEW! So happy i can play Mario Kart 8 again. Finding any brand new game would of been $40 plus. I was shocked to get one for $20. Mario Kart 8 is so fun. Must play for any Kart racing fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart is always the best game to play with friends and online !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the new graphics, characters. Mario Kart has been always my must-buy game in all system. I've had so much fun playing with friends and online game! I'll buy the 9 if it comes out!
customer_reviews.author: Vu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Others have written it best, great tracks
customer_reviews.text: Others have written it best, great tracks, graphics, and tricks. Downsides: no more automatic, only drift, blue shell even more annoying and frustrating, as now it can knock you off the track on its way to first place driver, bikes don't do wheelies anymore, and you can't hold an item behind you for protection and to pick up another item. At least they got rid of the cloud. The Battle mode is horrible. But the racing part is worth the admission.
customer_reviews.author: topdog

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: I love Mario Kart, I've loved it since I was younger. I've played many Mario Kart games from the old N64 to this new Mario Kart. I love this new version and I love the new karts that you can customize to your personal preference. My nephew and I have spend many an hour playing this game and arguing about who won and who had the best kart. Its a great family oriented game for the Wii U and a great addition as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart keeps changing, but that helps keep the memories of past games. Makes you want to own them all from every past machine.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun. I like driving around on the track and ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. I like driving around on the track and realizing that you are actually driving upside down :) One other thing I have noticed is that there are a bunch of ways through most courses. I have not explored them all, but there is a lot of content to explore.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game-play, rivals any racing game
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off this review by stating I've never been a huge fan of Mario-Kart. I was awful at the N64 classic, and since then have only dabbled in Double-Dash a few times. Mario Kart 8 is a complete game changer. You don't have to be a professional to have fun with this game (that doesn't mean you'll always win, but you will have fun). I built my skill up to finally unlock the golden tires, and am close (2 grand prix's away from earning the gold kart). Overall I've been excited for Nintendo's line-up of Super Smash Bros. Next and Legend of Zelda Wii-U; but Mario Kart 8 made the wait bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any wii u owner.
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is a must have for any Wii U owner. The game is fun and the online play is great. You do not even need a television screen to race. You can race by yourself and use your wii u gamepad as a screen. The controls are great. My only issue is that the game case is red while most wii u game cases are blue. The only other red game case I can think of at this time is Super Mario 3D World and this only applies to select copies.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: THE best game ever (so far) for the Wii U!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can assure you that every review you have read with a positive spin on this game is 100% legit! The game play, AWESOME! The visuals, SPECTACULAR! The fun factor, OFF THE CHARTS SPECTACULARLY AWESOME! My kids can't get enough! The new elements that Nintendo have added to the game... so welcoming and creative and fun and... ENOUGH! Stop reading reviews, and go buy this already! You will NOT BE DISAPPOINTED! Five out of FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: Bring Back N64 Method
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would bring back the way it was on N64 so that you could actually play against other people in the room with you without getting hit by shells from players built into the game. This game has really fun graphics, but the one issue I mention makes it less fun than it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Geek

customer_reviews.title: Not the savior of the wii u but a great addition to the series
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to the series. My favorite mario kart of all time is Double Dash but this game has beautifully updated graphics and fun online play. Some small things that may be off-putting to buyers is that two player split screen is always portrait view, some characters are repetitive like 5+ baby versions of the characters, and the interface in game does not show a mini map anymore. BUT blue shell can be countered with the new horn item so less friendships are now ruined because of this game.
customer_reviews.author: shibataken

customer_reviews.title: Mario Kart 8
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is great! Our family loves all Super Mario games. I find this one the most difficult to master though, that's for sure, and I'm 50!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great game for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We bought it based on great reviews, and we love it. I don't like story games and this is perfect for me. It's so fun, and I love the different scenes, always fun and exciting. I bought it used but it looked like new, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Crosscountrygirl

customer_reviews.title: This is on my top five best games for WiiU.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best racing games ever made. Possibly one of the most fun games I've played. It plays well with any controller configuration, even motion controls. It's online mode is fun and doesn't make you wait long for the next match, but surprisingly it's even fun to play single player. This is one of the most compelling games out right now and time just flies by when you're playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuro

customer_reviews.title: This game is fantastic, but I cannot give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This game is fantastic, but I cannot give it 5 stars. I hate hate _hate_ the lack of a battle arena. The balloon popping tracks are boring and lack the flavor and depth of the older Kart games. That, and baby luigi can ____ a ____ of ____. You fill in the blanks.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for fans of the genre.
customer_reviews.text: I find this installment just as much fun as the last mario kart series on the wii. So far, it seems cheaters are no where near to the level as they were on the wii. Must have for any wii u owner who enjoys this type of game.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, graphics are great
customer_reviews.text: Very fun, graphics are great. They improved a lot of stuff. The worst thing is they completely changed the battles. It's no longer arena style, and instead both teams drive opposite directions from each other on the courses. I have no idea what walnut brained mouth breather thought that would be better, because it's not. It's ruined battling.
customer_reviews.author: Bentang

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: What a great game - a shame you pay for it and then they want you to pay more if you want more tracks..
customer_reviews.author: BSH

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one week
customer_reviews.text: Worked for one week. My kids absolutely loved it. Never removed from the console and it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: ashley mortellaro

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grown sons birthday and he has enjoyed it tremendously!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GAME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Mario Kart yet! Love all the characters, bikes, races and car parts which really made the game awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Y.

customer_reviews.title: My kids (ages 12-17) LOVE this game
customer_reviews.text: My kids (ages 12-17) LOVE this game! We have several Mario Karts, but I have never heard so much laughter and so many hoots and hollers as there have been with this one. They love the "highlight" feature. I have not played it, but all four kids have had a blast playing together. It's so fun to hear them playing and laughing together. The game was a Christmas gift, and it's one of the best ones of this year.
customer_reviews.author: PeeWeeAnderson

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Own!
customer_reviews.text: Mario Kart 8 is everything you want in a Mario Kart game. Great character and weapon additions while staying true to gameplay. Just as fun as the previous versions. The Wii U finally makes sense to own. Mario Kart 8, Zelda Wind Waker HD, Super Mario 3D World and Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze are all very enjoyable games. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: P Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Great game! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This.Game.Is.Awesome. I have been enjoying my Nintendo WiiU for months now, and thought I was used to the updated graphics and sound. But when I turn on this game and start to play, the updated graphics and sound still blow me away. And on top of that, it's just a fun game. It took the classic things that have made Mario Kart a fun franchise and built on those things to improve the experience even more. And combined with Nintendo's free game download promotion, I couldn't go wrong with this purchase. As long as Nintendo keeps churning out classics like this, I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice family game. A racing challenge with minimal violence.
customer_reviews.text: Great game for family gatherings. The vehicle you choose and your skill at maneuvering around the track will determine your final outcome. My six-year-old granddaughter loves to play this. I learned choose a very maneuverable motorcycle up against her large vehicles to win once in a while. My granddaughter is a ruthless racer.
customer_reviews.author: Di Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. I never play on his wiiu, but I have been playing this game non-stop since Christmas!!! My son and I take turns playing the Grand Prix races. You can adjust the challenge of the game, by increasing the speed of the car. There are a wide variety of courses to choose from. It is also fun to do the timed Races and see if you can beat your own times. It is providing hours of fun and quality time with my son.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Mario Kart 8 - Nintendo Wii U
product_meta.description: *The DLC (Downloadable Content), Trials/Subscriptions may or may not be included and are not guaranteed to work*
feature_bullets: Race along walls and upside-down on twisting anti-gravity racetracks!
Share highlight videos of your greatest moments with friends via the Mario Kart TV feature and Miiverse.
Race and battle with friends locally or connect online to play with random players from around the world.
Fan favorite features from past Mario Kart games include gliders, underwater racing, motorbikes, mid-air tricks, and more.
Crisp HD graphics and fluid animation offers players the most visually stunning Mario Kart yet!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,875 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
